ground_truth: Diana helps Sandy up and pushes him aside as the car accelerates. Diana rolls up the windshield and falls to the pavement. Pushing the airbag away, the skiptracer sees a squad car speeding straight at him. As he turns, a car T-bones him. Sandy kneels over Diana. Sandy's face tenses. She startles awake. She punches him in the throat. Sandy flails backward. Sitting up, Diana sees a squad car speed by, then glances behind them. Squad cars surround the skiptracer. An officer hops out with his pistol drawn. The skiptracer sits back, dazed. They arrest him as Sandy and Diana scurry away unseen. They exit the overpass through a construction gate and down a staircase. Now, in a parking lot, Sandy and Diana stagger toward the Chevy Caprice. He looks off as she enters the car. Now, with St. Louis behind them, Sandy cruises along with a joyful grin as Diana sleeps. Later, the sun rises in a pale orange sky. In broad daylight, Sandy drives through rural farmland. He checks the fuel gauge on a country highway. Sandy keeps his tired eyes on the road. Glancing over, he startles as Diana sleeps with her glazed eyes wide open. Sandy gently closes her eyelids and her head falls into his lap. He yanks her up by the hair and Diana's mouth hangs open. Our view quickly rises into the sky, following the sun through a full day. At sunset, they cruise toward the Denver skyline. At night, Sandy parks the beat-up car outside his apartment and enters with Diana. His daughters run into his arms. Sandy's brow rises at his approaching wife. They share a long, loving kiss as Diana enters, her sheepish eyes averted to the floor. She connects eyes with Trish. The young girls extend their hands. Diana shifts her gaze to Sandy, who flashes a grin. Now, the Pattersons eat dinner with Diana. Trish looks at her husband, who glances at their guest and takes a bite. Sitting across from Diana, Sandy's daughters stare warily at her. Diana smears potatoes on her forehead. Jessie plops food onto her forehead with a fork. Later, Trish dries dishes in the kitchen. Diana timidly walks in and puts her hand on the counter. She removes it and straightens. Diana shifts her weight and steps closer. She outlines her groin and chest. Trish awkwardly blinks at her. Diana starts to go, then turns back. She gazes earnestly at Diana. The redhead leaves the kitchen. Watching her go, Trish clutches a plate and drying cloth. Her gaze wanders to the floor. Now, in bed, Sandy lies on his side. He rolls to his right and sidles up next to his wife, who lightly touches his shoulder.

test_cases.description: Diana is helped up by Sandy and is pushed aside by her as the car is accelerated. The windshield is rolled up by Diana and she falls to the pavement. The airbag is pushed away by him as the skiptracer sees a squad car speeding straight at him. As he turns, he is T-boned by a car. Diana is knelt over by Sandy. Sandy's face tenses. She is startled awake by him. He is punched in the throat by her. Sandy flails backward. Sitting up, a squad car is seen speeding by by Diana, then a glance is given behind them by her. The skiptracer is surrounded by squad cars. An officer hops out with his pistol drawn. The skiptracer sits back, dazed. As they scurry away unseen, he is arrested by them. The overpass is exited through a construction gate and down a staircase by them. Now, in a parking lot, the Chevy Caprice is staggered toward by Sandy and Diana. He looks off as the car is entered by her. Now, with St. Louis behind them, Sandy cruises along with a joyful grin while Diana sleeps. Later, a pale orange sky rises with the sun. In broad daylight, rural farmland is driven through by Sandy. The fuel gauge is checked by him on a country highway. Sandy keeps his tired eyes on the road. Glancing over, he is startled as Diana sleeps with her glazed eyes wide open. Her eyelids are gently closed by Sandy, and her head falls into his lap. She is yanked up by the hair by him, and her mouth hangs open. Our view quickly rises into the sky, following the sun through a full day. At sunset, they cruise toward the Denver skyline. At night, the beat-up car is parked outside his apartment by Sandy and he enters with Diana. His daughters run into his arms. Sandy's brow rises at his approaching wife. A long, loving kiss is shared by them as Diana enters, her sheepish eyes averted to the floor. She connects eyes with Trish. The young girls extend their hands. Her gaze is shifted to Sandy by Diana, who flashes a grin. Now, dinner is eaten by the Pattersons with Diana. Trish looks at her husband, who glances at their guest and takes a bite. Sitting across from Diana, a wary stare is given to her by Sandy's daughters. Potatoes are smeared on her forehead by Diana. Food is plopped onto her forehead with a fork by Jessie. Later, dishes are dried by Trish in the kitchen. Diana timidly walks in and puts her hand on the counter. It is removed and she straightens. Her weight is shifted and she steps closer. Her groin and chest are outlined by her. Trish awkwardly blinks at her. She starts to go, then turns back. An earnest gaze is given to Diana by her. The redhead leaves the kitchen. Watching her go, Trish clutches a plate and drying cloth. Her gaze wanders to the floor. Now, in bed, Sandy lies on his side. He rolls to his right and sidles up next to his wife, who lightly touches his shoulder.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Diana helps Sandy aside as the car speeds up. She rolls up the windshield and falls. The skiptracer pushes the airbag away, sees a squad car coming, turns, and a car T-bones him. Sandy kneels over Diana, who startles awake and punches him. He flails back. Diana sees a squad car pass, then checks behind. Squad cars surround the skiptracer. An officer with a pistol drawn arrests him as Sandy and Diana slip away unseen. They exit via a construction gate and staircase. In a parking lot, they stagger to a Chevy Caprice. With St. Louis behind them, Sandy drives while Diana sleeps. Later, under a pale orange sun, they travel through farmland. Sandy checks fuel on a country highway, startled to see Diana sleeping with open eyes. He gently closes them, and her head falls into his lap. He lifts her by the hair, her mouth open. Our view rises with the sun through a full day. At sunset, they approach Denver. At night, Sandy parks at his apartment. His daughters run to him. He shares a kiss with his wife as Diana enters, eyes down. She meets Trish's gaze. Sandy grins at Diana. The Pattersons have dinner with her. Trish and Sandy glance at their guest. Sandy's daughters watch Diana warily as she smears potatoes on her forehead. Jessie imitates her. Later, in the kitchen, Trish dries dishes. Diana timidly approaches, sets her hand on the counter, and straightens. She outlines her groin and chest. Trish awkwardly blinks. Diana turns to leave but looks back earnestly. Trish watches her go, clutching a plate. In bed, Sandy turns to his wife, who lightly touches his shoulder.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Diana aids Sandy as the car speeds up. She rolls off the windshield onto the pavement. As he dodges the airbag, the skiptracer sees a squad car rushing toward him and gets T-boned. Sandy leans over Diana, who awakens startled and punches him. Diana sits up and notices squad cars surrounding the skiptracer, who is arrested while Sandy and Diana slip away. They exit through a construction gate into a parking lot, heading to the Chevy Caprice. In St. Louis, Sandy drives joyfully as Diana sleeps. As daylight emerges, Sandy cruises through farmland, checking the fuel gauge. Diana sleeps with eyes open; Sandy gently closes them, her head falling into his lap, and lifts her by the hair. The scene transitions to Denver at sunset. At night, Sandy parks at his apartment, where his daughters greet him. His wife approaches, and they kiss as Diana enters with averted eyes, connecting with Trish. During dinner, the Pattersons eat with Diana. Trish looks at her husband, who glances at Diana while Sandy’s daughters watch her warily. Diana smears potatoes on her forehead, mimicked by Jessie. Later, Trish dries dishes in the kitchen; Diana enters, outlines her groin and chest, and leaves awkwardly. Trish observes her exit, holding a plate. In bed, Sandy rolls to his wife, who touches his shoulder.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Diana, with a determined expression, swiftly assists Sandy to his feet and promptly pushes him aside just as the car dramatically accelerates. In a frantic motion, Diana rolls up the windshield and tumbles hard onto the unforgiving pavement. Wrestling with the airbag, the skiptracer catches sight of a squad car hurtling directly toward him at great speed. In a desperate attempt to evade, he turns, only to be abruptly T-boned by a car, sending him reeling. Nearby, Sandy kneels protectively over Diana, his face tense with emotion and concern. Suddenly, Diana startles awake and, in a defensive reflex, delivers a sharp punch to Sandy’s throat, causing him to flail backward in surprise. 

As she sits up, Diana quickly notices a squad car speeding past them and then rapidly glances behind to assess the situation. They find themselves surrounded by squad cars converging on the skiptracer. An officer, exuding authority, jumps out of his vehicle with his pistol drawn and ready. The skiptracer sits back, appearing dazed and disoriented. They apprehend him efficiently while Sandy and Diana, seizing the moment, make a hasty, unnoticed escape. They slip unnoticed through an exit by the overpass, passing through a construction gate and down a flight of stairs.

Now finding themselves in a parking lot, Sandy and Diana stagger toward the familiar, somewhat battered Chevy Caprice. He momentarily looks off into the distance as she climbs into the car. Leaving behind the cityscape of St. Louis, Sandy drives with a joyful grin lighting up his face as Diana drifts into a peaceful sleep. Later, the sunrise casts a pale orange light across the sky, marking the new day as Sandy continues to drive through the scenic rural farmland. On a quiet country highway, he checks the fuel gauge, keeping his weary eyes fixed on the road ahead. When he glances over at Diana, he is startled to find her apparently sleeping with her eyes wide open, a disconcerting sight that deeply unsettles him. With gentle care, Sandy tenderly closes her eyelids, and her head falls softly into his lap. He abruptly lifts her up by the hair, leaving her mouth hanging open in a state of unconsciousness. 

Our perspective shifts dramatically, rising swiftly into the expansive sky, following the sun as it makes its journey through an entire day. As sunset approaches, they drive toward the majestic Denver skyline, illuminated by the fading light. In the darkness of night, Sandy parks the well-worn car outside his modest apartment and enters with Diana at his side. His daughters enthusiastically run to greet him, throwing themselves into his arms with joyous smiles. Sandy's brow raises in anticipation at the sight of his approaching wife, and they share a long, affectionate kiss. Diana, entering with sheepish eyes directed downward toward the floor, meets Trish's gaze. The young girls reach out with hands extended in welcome, prompting Diana to shift her gaze back to Sandy, who offers her a reassuring grin.

The scene shifts to the Pattersons, joined by Diana, seated together at the dinner table. Trish exchanges glances with her husband, who looks over at their guest and takes a thoughtful bite of his meal. Across the table, Sandy's daughters focus their attention on Diana, their expressions cautious and curious. In a light-hearted moment, Diana unexpectedly smears potatoes on her forehead, leading Jessie to gleefully mimic the gesture by plopping food onto her own forehead with a fork. Later, Trish stands in the kitchen, methodically drying dishes. Diana enters timidly, putting a tentative hand on the counter before removing it and straightening herself. She shifts her weight, stepping closer with an air of hesitancy, and outlines her groin and chest in an uncertain gesture. Trish blinks awkwardly, trying to make sense of the situation. Diana starts to leave but then pauses, turning back to meet Trish's earnest gaze. The redhead, filled with unspoken thoughts, quietly exits the kitchen. Observing her departure, Trish clutches a plate and drying cloth, her gaze gradually wandering down to the floor, lost in contemplation.

Now, the scene transitions to the bedroom, where Sandy lies on his side, resting. He turns to his right, gently sidling up next to his wife. With a soft, tender touch, she lightly places her hand on his shoulder, conveying a sense of comfort and connection.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
Diana, her face set with a determined expression, quickly and efficiently assists Sandy as he struggles to his feet. With urgency, she promptly shoves him aside just as the car, with a dramatic surge, accelerates forward. In a frantic and instinctive motion, Diana rolls over the windshield, only to tumble hard onto the unforgiving pavement. As she wrestles with the airbag, the skiptracer catches sight of a squad car barreling directly toward him at a terrifying speed. In a desperate bid to avoid the collision, he turns, only to be abruptly T-boned by another vehicle, which sends him reeling. Nearby, Sandy kneels protectively over Diana, his face etched with a mixture of tension and deep concern. Suddenly, Diana startles into awareness and, in a defensive reflex, delivers a swift, sharp punch to Sandy’s throat, causing him to flail backward in surprise.

As Diana sits up, she quickly observes a squad car speeding past them and then rapidly glances behind to assess the unfolding situation. They find themselves encircled by squad cars converging on the skiptracer. An authoritative officer, exuding a commanding presence, leaps out of his vehicle, his pistol drawn and at the ready. The skiptracer sits back, appearing dazed and disoriented. The officers efficiently apprehend him while Sandy and Diana, seizing the opportune moment, make a swift and unnoticed escape. They slip away undetected through an exit located by the overpass, passing quietly through a construction gate and descending a flight of stairs.

Now finding themselves in a parking lot, Sandy and Diana stagger toward the familiar, albeit slightly battered, Chevy Caprice. For a brief moment, Sandy gazes off into the distance as Diana climbs into the car. As they leave behind the cityscape of St. Louis, Sandy drives with a joyful grin lighting up his face, while Diana gradually drifts into a peaceful sleep. Later, the sunrise casts a pale, soft orange light across the morning sky, marking the arrival of a new day as Sandy continues to drive through the scenic countryside of rural farmland. On a quiet stretch of country highway, he checks the fuel gauge, his weary eyes fixed intently on the road ahead. When he steals a quick glance over at Diana, he is startled to find her apparently sleeping with her eyes wide open, a disconcerting sight that deeply unsettles him. With gentle care, Sandy tenderly closes her eyelids, and her head falls softly, coming to rest in his lap. He then abruptly lifts her up by the hair, leaving her mouth hanging open in a state of unconsciousness.

Our perspective shifts dramatically, soaring swiftly into the expansive, open sky, following the sun as it journeys through an entire day. As sunset approaches, they drive toward the majestic Denver skyline, beautifully illuminated by the fading light. In the darkness of night, Sandy parks the well-worn car outside his modest apartment, entering with Diana at his side. His daughters, filled with enthusiasm, run to greet him, eagerly throwing themselves into his arms with joyful smiles. Sandy's brow raises in anticipation as he catches sight of his wife approaching, and they share a long, deeply affectionate kiss. Diana enters with sheepish eyes, directed downward toward the floor, eventually meeting Trish's gaze. The young girls extend their hands in welcome, prompting Diana to shift her gaze back to Sandy, who offers her a reassuring grin.

The scene shifts to the Pattersons, now joined by Diana, as they sit together around the dinner table. Trish exchanges meaningful glances with her husband, who looks thoughtfully over at their guest while taking a bite of his meal. Across the table, Sandy's daughters focus their attention on Diana, their expressions both cautious and curious. In a light-hearted, unexpected moment, Diana playfully smears potatoes on her forehead, leading Jessie to gleefully mimic the gesture by plopping food onto her own forehead with a fork. Later, Trish stands in the kitchen, methodically drying dishes with a focused, meticulous air. Diana timidly enters, placing a tentative hand on the counter before quickly removing it and straightening herself. She shifts her weight uneasily, stepping closer with an air of hesitancy, and outlines her groin and chest in an uncertain gesture. Trish blinks awkwardly, attempting to make sense of the situation. Diana starts to leave but then pauses, turning back to meet Trish's earnest gaze. The redhead, filled with unspoken thoughts, quietly exits the kitchen. Observing her departure, Trish clutches a plate and drying cloth, her gaze gradually wandering downward to the floor, lost in contemplative thought.

Now, the scene transitions to the bedroom, where Sandy lies on his side, resting peacefully. He turns to his right, gently sidling up next to his wife. With a soft and tender touch, she lightly places her hand on his shoulder, conveying a deep sense of comfort and emotional connection.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Diana quickly extends a helping hand to Sandy, pulling him up and swiftly pushing him aside just as the car revs up, accelerating forward with a burst of speed. In the ensuing chaos, Diana rapidly rolls up the windshield, losing her balance and tumbling to the pavement below. Amidst the confusion, the skiptracer, struggling to regain composure, pushes the airbag away from his face and catches sight of a squad car barreling directly toward him. Just as he attempts to react, a sudden impact occurs—a car collides with him from the side. Meanwhile, Sandy urgently kneels over Diana, intently observing her expression as his own face tightens with concern. Diana jolts awake, her reflexes kicking in as she quickly strikes Sandy in the throat, causing him to stagger backward. As Diana sits upright, she immediately notices a squad car zipping past, prompting her to quickly glance around. She observes that the skiptracer is now surrounded by an array of squad cars. An officer promptly jumps out with his pistol at the ready, and the skiptracer, appearing dazed and disoriented, leans back in his seat. Taking advantage of the commotion, Sandy and Diana hastily make their escape, managing to slip away unnoticed. They skillfully maneuver through a construction gate and descend a staircase, finding themselves in a parking lot where they stagger toward a Chevy Caprice. As Diana enters the car, Sandy momentarily looks off into the distance. With the city of St. Louis now behind them, Sandy drives along with a joyful grin on his face while Diana rests beside him. As time passes and the sun rises, casting a pale orange hue over the sky, Sandy continues driving through a stretch of rural farmland in broad daylight. He periodically checks the fuel gauge as they travel along a country highway, ensuring they have enough to keep going. Despite his fatigue, Sandy keeps his eyes focused on the road, but a glance to his side startles him when he sees Diana asleep, her eyes eerily open. Displaying gentle care, Sandy softly closes her eyelids, causing her head to fall into his lap. With a sudden motion, he pulls her upright by her hair, leaving her mouth hanging open. As the scene shifts, our perspective elevates, following the sun throughout an entire day until sunset, when they drive toward the striking silhouette of the Denver skyline. At night, Sandy parks the worn-out car outside his apartment and, with Diana accompanying him, enters the building. The moment they step inside, Sandy's daughters rush forward with exuberant energy, enveloping him in their arms. With a tender expression, Sandy's brow rises as he notices his wife approaching, leading to a long, affectionate kiss between them, while Diana quietly enters, directing her sheepish gaze to the floor. A silent interaction unfolds as Diana makes eye contact with Trish. Sandy looks on, flashing a reassuring grin, as the young girls extend their hands in a welcoming gesture. Diana, momentarily uncertain, shifts her gaze toward Sandy's supportive expression. Later, the Pattersons gather around the dinner table, sharing a meal with Diana. Trish glances at her husband, who, after a fleeting look at their guest, resumes eating. Across the table, Sandy's daughters watch Diana with cautious curiosity as she playfully smears potatoes on her forehead. Inspired, Jessie follows suit, placing food on her forehead with her fork. The evening progresses and finds Trish standing in the kitchen, methodically drying dishes. Diana approaches timidly, placing her hand on the counter before retracting it and straightening her posture. She adjusts her stance, stepping slightly closer as she gestures toward her groin and chest, an awkward moment ensues as Trish blinks, unsure of how to respond. Just as Diana is about to leave, she pauses and turns back, her gaze earnestly meeting Trish's before the redhead exits the kitchen. Trish, observing her departure, clutches the plate and drying cloth tightly, her attention drifting briefly to the floor. As night falls, Sandy lies in bed on his side, contemplating for a moment before rolling to his right and nestling closer to his wife, who responds with a gentle touch on his shoulder.

test_cases.description: Diana helps Sandy up and moves him aside as the car accelerates. She rolls up the windshield, falls to the pavement, and pushes the airbag away while a squad car speeds toward the skiptracer, who gets T-boned by another car. Sandy kneels over Diana, who starts awake and punches him in the throat. As he recoils, Diana sits up to see squad cars surrounding the skiptracer. An officer with a drawn pistol arrests the dazed skiptracer, allowing Sandy and Diana to slip away unnoticed. They navigate through a construction gate and down a staircase, eventually reaching a parking lot where they stagger toward a Chevy Caprice. Sandy pauses as Diana enters the car, and they drive away from St. Louis. As Sandy cruises with a joyful grin, Diana sleeps beside him. The sun rises as he drives through rural farmland, checking the fuel gauge on a country highway. With tired eyes on the road, Sandy startles to find Diana sleeping with wide-open eyes. He gently closes her eyelids, letting her head rest in his lap, and then yanks her up by the hair. The view shifts to follow the sun through a full day until they cruise toward the Denver skyline at sunset. At night, Sandy parks outside his apartment and enters with Diana. His daughters run to greet him, and he shares a loving kiss with his wife. Diana looks sheepishly at the floor before connecting eyes with Trish. The young girls extend their hands, prompting Diana to shift her gaze to Sandy, who grins. The Pattersons then share dinner with Diana, where Trish and Sandy exchange glances and take bites while their daughters stare warily at Diana, who smears potatoes on her forehead. Jessie imitates her with a fork. Later, Trish dries dishes in the kitchen as Diana timidly enters, hesitantly placing her hand on the counter before straightening. She outlines her groin and chest awkwardly, causing Trish to blink. Diana starts to leave, then turns back for an earnest gaze before exiting, leaving Trish staring at the floor clutching a plate and drying cloth. In bed, Sandy rolls over and draws close to his wife, who lightly touches his shoulder.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Diana helps Sandy, a seasoned skiptracer who specializes in tracking down elusive debtors, up and pushes him aside as the car accelerates away from the chaos. Diana rolls up the windshield, which had been shattered during the impact, and falls to the pavement, a common risk in high-speed chases. Pushing the airbag away, the skiptracer sees a squad car, one of the St. Louis Police Department's fleet, speeding straight at him. As he turns, a car T-bones him with the force typical of reckless pursuit. Sandy kneels over Diana, his face tensing with concern. She startles awake from her unconscious state and instinctively punches him in the throat, a defensive move she'd learned in self-defense classes. Sandy flails backward, shocked. Sitting up, Diana sees a squad car speed by, then glances behind them to note the police presence. Squad cars surround the skiptracer like a well-rehearsed tactic. An officer hops out with his pistol drawn, enforcing the city's zero-tolerance policy for fugitives. The skiptracer sits back, dazed and overwhelmed by the swift police response. The officers arrest him, efficiently moving in with practiced precision, as Sandy and Diana scurry away unseen. They exit the overpass through a construction gate, a common escape route, and down a staircase that leads to a more secluded area. Now, in a parking lot, Sandy and Diana stagger toward the Chevy Caprice, a model once favored for its durability. He looks off as she enters the car. Now, with St. Louis behind them, Sandy cruises along the quiet highways with a joyful grin as Diana sleeps, relieved to have escaped capture. Later, the sun rises in a pale orange sky, painting the landscape in warm hues. In broad daylight, Sandy drives through rural farmland, an area characterized by its vast, open fields. He checks the fuel gauge on a country highway, conscious of the need to refuel soon. Sandy keeps his tired eyes on the road, aware of the long distance yet to cover. Glancing over, he startles as Diana sleeps with her glazed eyes wide open, a sign of exhaustion and her recent ordeal. Sandy gently closes her eyelids and her head falls into his lap, a gesture of quiet care. He yanks her up by the hair, startled by the idea she might slip into unconsciousness again, and Diana's mouth hangs open in surprise. Our view quickly rises into the sky, following the sun through a full day, its journey mirroring their drive westward. At sunset, they cruise toward the Denver skyline, a city known for its striking Rocky Mountain backdrop. At night, Sandy parks the beat-up car outside his apartment complex, an area marked by its close-knit community, and enters with Diana. His daughters run into his arms, their gleeful laughter echoing in the hallway. Sandy's brow rises at his approaching wife, signaling the joy of reunion. They share a long, loving kiss, a testament to their enduring relationship, as Diana enters, her sheepish eyes averted to the floor, unsettled by the warmth she witnesses. She connects eyes with Trish, Sandy's wife, who gives her a tentative nod. The young girls extend their hands, eager to share their world. Diana shifts her gaze to Sandy, who flashes a reassuring grin, signaling acceptance. Now, the Pattersons eat dinner with Diana, sharing a meal that symbolizes family unity. Trish looks at her husband, who glances at their guest and takes a bite, indicating his trust in the situation. Sitting across from Diana, Sandy's daughters stare warily at her, a mixture of curiosity and caution. Diana smears potatoes on her forehead, unexpectedly breaking the tension with humor. Jessie, one of the girls and known for her mischievous spirit, plops food onto her forehead with a fork, mimicking Diana. Later, Trish dries dishes in the kitchen, her movements methodical and calming. Diana timidly walks in and puts her hand on the counter, searching for words. She removes it and straightens, gathering her thoughts. Diana shifts her weight and steps closer, outlining her groin and chest, a gesture hinting at her vulnerability and need to communicate. Trish awkwardly blinks at her, struggling to interpret the message. Diana starts to go, then turns back, her gaze earnest and searching. She gazes earnestly at Diana, seeking understanding. The redhead leaves the kitchen, her footsteps soft and retreating. Watching her go, Trish clutches a plate and drying cloth, her mind contemplating the encounter. Her gaze wanders to the floor, reflecting on the complexities of human connection. Now, in bed, Sandy lies on his side, the warmth of home enveloping him. He rolls to his right and sidles up next to his wife, who lightly touches his shoulder, a simple gesture of comfort and familiarity.

test_cases.description: Diana helps Sandy up and pushes him aside as the car accelerates. Diana rolls up the windshield and falls to the pavement. Pushing the airbag away the skiptracer sees a squad car speeding straight at him. As he turns a car Tbones him. Sandy kneels over Diana. Sandy's face tenses. She startles awake. She punches him in the throat. Sandy flails backward. Sitting up Diana sees a squad car speed by then glances behind them. Squad cars surround the skiptracer. An officer hops out with his pistol drawn. The skiptracer sits back dazed. They arrest him as Sandy and Diana scurry away unseen. Sandy gently closes her eyelids and her head falls into his lap. He yanks her up by the hair and Diana's mouth hangs open. Our view quickly rises into the sky following the sun through a full day. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. At sunset they cruise toward the Denver skyline. At night Sandy parks the beatup car outside his apartment and enters with Diana. His daughters run into his arms. Sandy's brow rises at his approaching wife. They share a long loving kiss as Diana enters her sheepish eyes averted to the floor. She connects eyes with Trish. The young girls extend their hands. Diana shifts her gaze to Sandy who flashes a grin. Now the Pattersons eat dinner with Diana. Trish looks at her husband who glances at their guest and takes a bite. Sitting across from Diana. Sandy's daughters stare warily at her. Diana smears potatoes on her forehead. Jessie plops food onto her forehead with a fork. Later Trish dries dishes in the kitchen. Diana timidly walks in and puts her hand on the counter. She removes it and straightens. Diana shifts her weight and steps closer. She outlines her groin and chest. Trish awkwardly blinks at her. Diana starts to go then turns back. She gazes earnestly at Diana. The redhead leaves the kitchen. Watching her go. Trish clutches a plate and drying cloth. Her gaze wanders to the floor. Now in bed Sandy lies on his side. He rolls to his right and sidles up next to his wife who lightly touches his shoulder.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Diana helps Sandy up and pushes him aside as the car accelerates. Diana rolls up the windshield and falls to the pavement. Pushing the airbag away the skiptracer sees a squad car speeding straight at him. As he turns a car Tbones him. Sandy kneels over Diana. Sandy's face tenses. She startles awake. She punches him in the throat. Sandy flails backward. Sitting up Diana sees a squad car speed by then glances behind them. Squad cars surround the skiptracer. An officer hops out with his pistol drawn. The skiptracer sits back dazed. They arrest him as Sandy and Diana scurry away unseen. They exit the overpass through a construction gate and down a staircase. Now in a parking lot. Sandy and Diana stagger toward the Chevy Caprice. He looks off as she enters the car. Now with St Louis behind them. Sandy cruises along with a joyful grin as Diana sleeps. Later the sun rises in a pale orange sky. In broad daylight Sandy drives through rural farmland. He checks the fuel gauge on a country highway. Sandy keeps his tired eyes on the road. Glancing over he startles as Diana sleeps with her glazed eyes wide open. Sandy gently closes her eyelids and her head falls into his lap. He yanks her up by the hair and Diana's mouth hangs open. Our view quickly rises into the sky following the sun through a full day. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Ralph nudges Timmy down and tosses him aside as the bicycle glides. Ralph pulls down the sunshade and slips onto the grass. Pushing the helmet away, the firefighter spots a fire truck zooming directly towards him. As he pivots, a tricycle smacks into him sideways. Timmy crouches over Ralph. Timmy's expression tightens. He jerks awake. He elbows him in the belly. Timmy tumbles forward. Standing up, Ralph notices a fire truck rush past, then peeks behind them. Fire trucks encircle the firefighter. A ranger leaps out with his walkie-talkie ready. The firefighter reclines, bewildered. They detain him as Timmy and Ralph sneak away unnoticed. They depart the tunnel via a garden path and up an escalator. Now, in a garage, Timmy and Ralph stumble toward the Volkswagen Beetle. He glances off as she climbs into the vehicle. Now, with Chicago in the distance, Timmy glides along with a cheerful whistle as Ralph snoozes. Later, the moon glows in a pale yellow sky. In broad daylight, Timmy rolls through urban streets. He peers at the temperature gauge on a coastal freeway. Timmy maintains his weary gaze on the trail. Peeking over, he jumps as Ralph naps with his vacant eyes shut open. Timmy softly closes his nostrils and her head rests into his elbow. He pulls her up by the scarf and Ralph's mouth yawns open. Our perspective swiftly rises into the clouds, following the moon through an entire evening. At dusk, they glide toward the Seattle skyline. At midnight, Timmy secures the ancient boat outside his home and strolls in with Ralph. His cats pounce into his lap. Timmy's eyes widen at his approaching dog. They exchange a long, cuddly embrace as Ralph saunters in, her bashful eyes lowered to the rug. She aligns eyes with Alex. The tiny animals stretch their paws. Ralph shifts her vision to Timmy, who beams a grin. Now, the Johnsons chat with Ralph. Alex peers at her partner, who peeks at their companion and sips a drink. Sitting across from Ralph, Timmy's cats eye suspiciously at her. Ralph rubs yams on her cheek. Jessie drops food onto her cheek with a spoon. Earlier, Alex polishes mugs in the den. Ralph cautiously strolls in and places her foot on the stool. She retracts it and straightens. Ralph shifts her position and steps nearer. She outlines her shoulder and arm. Alex awkwardly winks at her. Ralph begins to leave, then spins back. She looks intently at Ralph. The brunette exits the den. Observing her leave, Alex grips a cup and cloth. Her attention drifts to the carpet. Now, in a hammock, Timmy lies on his stomach. He flips to his left and nudges up next to his partner, who gently pats his knee.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Diana helps Sandy up and pushes him aside as they dodge an accelerating car. Diana rolls onto the pavement as the skiptracer faces an oncoming squad car but is T-boned by another vehicle. Seizing the opportunity, Sandy and Diana escape as officers surround and arrest the dazed skiptracer. They quickly navigate through a construction gate and staircase, reaching a Chevy Caprice. Sandy drives with a joyful grin as Diana sleeps. Later, he gently closes her wide-open eyes as she rests. The scene transitions from a rural highway to the Denver skyline at sunset. Sandy parks outside his apartment, greeted by his daughters and wife with a loving kiss. Inside, Diana joins the family for dinner, where Trish and Sandy share a subtle exchange about their guest. Sandy's daughters curiously observe Diana, who mimics one of them by smearing potatoes on her forehead. In the kitchen, Diana approaches Trish, awkwardly outlining her actions, but leaves hesitantly. Trish watches her, contemplating. Later, Sandy lies in bed beside his wife, who gently touches his shoulder.
